item.title: Getting started with Vue in Matomo
item.description: Getting started with Vue in MatomoAt the time of writing, developing with Vue is not so straight forward. The documentation online is very scarse. But I managed to dig out some of it and listed it here: Matomo getting started with Vue => Getting started with Vue Matomo JavaScript and CSS => Working with Piwiks UI Matomo Vue => Vue: In Depth Vue PoC => POC: Vue.js 3 migration path #17805 Initial commit => [Vue] Introduce Vue + Workflow commands #17940 Description on assets pipeline => [Vue] Documentation on the asset pipeline and how Vue/TypeScript are handled #541 BuildingMatomo Core team has wrapped traditional Vue building scripts into PHP to run with the .
